name: Blood and Sorcery
description:
This is an action adventure 2D platforming pixel art game, inspired by dark souls. Fight bosses and gain new abilities in order to cleanse the corruption from the land!

- gameplay has some elements from the souls series, such as dodge rolling, stamina and mana bars as well as boss fights.

- movement controls are like a standard 2D platformer

- different abilities are acquired and can be used

- game has different zones that you can progress to once you have beaten the boss of the area (similar to dark souls)
